title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 305.3 - Payment of further adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 305.3 - Payment of further adjustment

State Regulations

Any further adjustment granted or approved pursuant to
section
305.2
of this Part shall be paid
from monies appropriated for such purpose to State University, or from any
monies otherwise available to State University. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
305.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
